name: FALL BALL: ADDICTIVE FALLING
description:
The goal is to make the ball fall down successfully.

Rules:
You have 5 shots for each 5 level.
If you dont succeed for 5 times you will return to previous level. But dont worry you have check points for each 5 levels.
Tips:
Wait for the right time for levels that may seem impossible. There is absolutely a deficit.
